page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content: The only school within our area is Dallington Church of England (Controlled) Primary school. The original school was opened in 1854 and closed in 1913 when the new school was opened on a site futher up the road by Dame Ruth Buckley. The buildings cover a floor area of approx 500 square metres including 2 temporary classrooms (erected in 1972 and still in use). This figure includes a fine assembly hall,4 classrooms 3 small stock cupboards and head teachers room.The playing area has an effective area of 0.5 ha and a hard play area of 600 sq.m.The swimming pool measures 12m x 5m. and holds aprox 6000 gallons of water. There are 110 pupils on roll from the parishes of Dallington, Brightling,Ashburnham,Bodle Street and parts of Netherfield,Battle and Rushlake Green.
